arguments.description: The top-left x position of the rectangle.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The top-left y position of the rectangle.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: (false/nil) The rectangle will be filled, (true) The rectangle will have only lines (border).
arguments.name: l

arguments.description: The color of the rectangle (0-15), defaults to the active color.
arguments.name: c

notes: The arguments can be passed in a table
shortDescription: Draws a rectangle on the screen.
